member.name: M:PruebaEurofirms.Controllers.RickAndMortyController.ImportCharacters
member.summary: Imports characters that are not present in the database. If present, they are skipped.
member.response: Returns the count of characters successfully inserted.
Returns an error message if an unexpected error occurred during the import.

member.name: M:PruebaEurofirms.Controllers.RickAndMortyController.GetCharactersByStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the characters filtered by their status (Alive, Dead, Unknown).
member.param: The status of the characters to retrieve (Alive, Dead, or Unknown).
member.returns: Returns a list of characters matching the provided status.
member.response: Returned if the status provided is invalid.
Returned if an unexpected error occurs.

member.name: M:PruebaEurofirms.Controllers.RickAndMortyController.DeleteCharacter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the character associated with the provided ID.
member.param: The Id for the character to be deleted.
member.returns: Success message in case the character was deleted
